summary: Various useful batch files for Skyrim (This does not include DLC's)
descriptionHtml:
[b]UPDATED TO 2.2[/b]


Contains the following BAT files

Enchant - Gives you ALL the (Vanilla) enchanted items (You will need to break these down to learn the spells)

Keys - Gives you 1 of every key in game

Spells - Gives you all vanilla spells

Alchemy - gives you all alchemical ingredients 

Shouts - lets you learn all in game shouts
(Does NOT include the quest shouts as this can break the game)

ShoutUNlock - lets you unlock all the shouts taught to you from the shouts bat file.

Perks - unlocks all perk trees (I recommend using this after you level up with the skills file)

Skills - sets all skills to 100 (the legal way so you level up naturally via XP [b][u][i][size=3]USE ONLY ONCE PER SAVE FILE[/size][/i][/u][/b])

Smithing - Gives you all smithing items

Cooking - all RAW ingredients

House - Gives you all the misc hearthfire building materials


Activation
Drop the bat files into your skyrim main folder (Usually) Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim
activate them via opening the console ingame and typing in bat (file name) without brakcets.
author: nathanb16
